name: Folder Access Request
body:
Hi [MANAGER_NAME],

Please approve access to the [FOLDER_NAME] folder for [USER_NAME]. Their username is [USERNAME] and their email address is [USER_EMAIL].

Thank you.

name: Password Reset Confirmation
body:
Hi [USER_NAME],

Your password for the account [USERNAME] has been reset successfully. If you did not request this change or if you experience any issues signing in, please contact the Service Desk. Your registered email address is [USER_EMAIL].

Thank you.

name: Bitwarden Secure Send
body:
Hi [USER_NAME],

I have securely shared the requested credentials using Bitwarden Secure Send. Please check your inbox ([USER_EMAIL]) for a link titled '[SECURE_ITEM_NAME]'. The link will expire after [EXPIRATION_TIME].

Thank you.

name: Access Approval Request
body:
Hi [MANAGER_NAME],

[USER_NAME] ([USERNAME], [USER_EMAIL]) requires access to [RESOURCE_NAME] for [REASON]. Please confirm if this request is approved.

Thank you.

name: Ticket Update / Follow-up
body:
Hi [USER_NAME],

Just a quick update regarding your ticket #[TICKET_NUMBER] for your account [USERNAME] ([USER_EMAIL]): [UPDATE_DETAILS].

Let us know if you need any further assistance.
